name: [ANY] Admin Funcommands Limiter 1.3
short_description:
Description

This Plugin allows all the sourcemod funcommands to be limited.
Commands Include:
sm_kick
sm_ban
sm_slap
sm_beacon
sm_blind
sm_timebomb
sm_burn
sm_firebomb
sm_freeze
sm_freezebomb
sm_gravity
sm_drug
sm_noclip
sm_slay

When an admin does one of these commands, they are given warnings and are subsequently kicked or banned depending on the ConVars below.

ConVars:
Neatly include in a config file (tf\cfg\sourcemod\admincontrol_cfg)

Version

1.0 - Initial Release
1.1 - Added Logging for Bans, Warnings, Kicks.
Fixed plugins version error.
1.2 - Added optional immunity for clients with the rcon flag.
1.3 - Added structured cvar names.
Tidied up code.
added a cvar to suppress the "You have had x out of y warnings" chat message.
Big Credit to Dr.McKay

Setup

Click "Get Plugin" and drag it from your downloads into tf\addons\sourcemod\plugins

Notes

Tested on TF2 - Should work with every sourcemod compatible game.
summary: Allows the Sourcemod FunCommands to be limited
